The Agentic State

This whitepaper aims to stimulate discussion on how agentic AI will revamp 10 functional layers of government and public administration, challenging assumptions and establishing a shared basis for experimentation. The authors aim to work openly with the wider GovTech community, expanding and refining the document in successive versions.
